vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προορ-ίζω,
determine beforehand, ἡμέραν [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; predetermine, predestine, ἡμᾶς εἰς υἱοθεσίαν [NT]; τινὰς συμμόρφους (i.e. γενέσθαι) [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to predestine, decide beforehand predetermine
to limit, or mark out beforehand; to design definitely beforehand, ordain beforehand, predestine, Acts 4:28; Rom. 8:29, 30
vocabInfos._es_Definition: decidir desde el principio o de antemano, predestinar; apartar desde el principio o de antemano
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: định trước ; tiền định. πρό (G4253) + ὁρίζω (G3724)
